amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the Commandant of the Coast Guard to conduct a comprehensive security and safety review of the proposed construction, expansion, or operation of a waterfront facility for the transfer of liquefied natural gas from ships to land or from land to ships, including proposed shipping routes to or from the facility.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in the Congressional Record to direct the Coast Guard to conduct a comprehensive security and safety review of liquefied natural gas facilities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Markey amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 254 (Roll no. 473).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Markey.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Markey amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 254 (Roll no. 473).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
